name: Deploy Main

on:
  workflow_run:
    workflows: ["Build Main"]
    types:
      - completed

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
      - name: Setup kubectl
        uses: azure/setup-kubectl@v3
        with:
          version: 'latest'

      - name: Use Kubectl to delete the old version of the app
        uses: actions-hub/kubectl@master
        env:
          KUBE_CONFIG: ${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}
        with:
          args: delete -f overlays/k8smain/app.yaml

      - name: Use Kubectl to apply the new version of the app
        uses: actions-hub/kubectl@master
        env:
          KUBE_CONFIG: ${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}
        with:
          args: apply -f overlays/k8smain/app.yaml
